const response = await client.search({
  index: "sales",
  size: 0,
  aggs: {
    sales_per_month: {
      date_histogram: {
        field: "date",
        calendar_interval: "month",
      },
      aggs: {
        total_sales: {
          sum: {
            field: "price",
          },
        },
        sales_bucket_sort: {
          bucket_sort: {
            sort: [
              {
                total_sales: {
                  order: "desc",
                },
              },
            ],
            size: 3,
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
